Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants where no SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 measured until the next definitive reviewer outcome (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include a successful SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 when followed by a second reminder (Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and Assign a Different Editor in cases where reviewer assignment fails repeatedly
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to the final decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision) in variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'
